009package HoughTransform;
010
011import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
012import imagingbook.sampleimages.RansacTestImage;
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
015
016/**
017 * Hough line detection demo. Opens a local sample image and then runs
018 * plugin {@link Hough_Lines_Detect}.
019 * 
020 * @author WB
021 *
022 */
023public class Hough_Lines_Demo implements PlugIn {
024        
025        private static RansacTestImage resource = RansacTestImage.NoisyLines;
026
027        @Override
028        public void run(String arg) {
029                
030                ImagePlus im = resource.getImage();
031                im.show();
032                
033                IjUtils.run(new Hough_Lines_Detect());
034                im.close();
035        }
036
037}
